house_listing.house_description: Old world charm! 3 story with walk in attic room! Basement large enough for laundry & storage! Large screened porch & enclosed porch balcony off one bedroom! Immaculate condition! Hardwood floors! Remodeled kitchen! Shared driveway! Convenient location! Almost new roof & fresh paint
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), Colonial Style, Foyer, Storage Space,Sun Room, Utility Room
